accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.description: You do not have permission to view the Configuration module.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Configuration Module
welcome.description: This is the central hub for managing all aspects of the Guardian Gate system.
welcome.content: Use the navigation on the left to manage ports, terminals, machines, system messages, and more. These settings ensure that all modules operate smoothly according to your operational requirements.

table.description: Select the default language to use for media and messages for each country.

Transactions.rowsSelected: {count, plural, one {# row selected.} other {# rows selected.}}
Transactions.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the transaction record for {passengerName} (ID: {transactionId}).
Transactions.deleteErrorDesc: There was an error deleting the transaction data.

toast.passengerNotFoundDesc: No existing record found. Please fill details manually.
toast.transactionRecordedDesc: The transaction for {passengerName} has been processed with decision: {decision}.

passengerSearch.title: 1. Search Passenger
passengerSearch.description: Search for an existing passenger by their passport number.

verification.title: 2. Officer Verification
verification.description: Manually confirm all checks are complete.

decision.title: 3. Final Decision
decision.description: Record the final outcome and any relevant notes.
decision.highRiskDesc: This passenger is marked as high-risk. Proceed with caution and follow protocol.

toast.extractionFailedDescription: Could not read data from document. Please try again with a clearer image.
toast.missingInfoDescription: Face Scan is required to proceed.
toast.missingDataDescription: Cannot complete transaction due to missing data.
toast.transactionCompleteDescription: Passenger processed and record saved. Decision: {decision}
toast.transferredDescription: Transaction {id} has been sent for supervisor review.
toast.transferFailedDescription: Could not transfer to duty manager due to missing passenger data.
toast.cameraErrorDescription: The camera stream is not ready yet. Please wait a moment and try again.

alert.escalatedNotes: Passenger requires visa but none was found. Escalated to Duty Manager.
alert.missingVisaDescription: This passenger requires a visa, but a valid one was not found. This transaction must be escalated.

uploadDocument.title: 1. Scan Document
uploadDocument.description: Place the passenger's passport on the scanner or upload an image to begin.

matchFound.title: Passenger Match Found
matchFound.description: An existing record was found. Please review and choose how to proceed.
matchFound.chooseActionDescription: Select how to proceed with this passenger.
matchFound.updateAll: Update All Info with Scan & Continue

confirmNew.title: 2. Confirm Passenger Data
confirmNew.description: Please verify the data extracted from the document.

capturePhoto.title: 3. Capture Biometrics
capturePhoto.description: Perform live biometric scans of the passenger. Face scan is required.

analyzing.title: Analyzing...
analyzing.description: AI is assessing risk based on the data provided. Please wait.

review.title: 4. Officer Review & Decision
review.description: Review the AI assessment and make a final decision.

completed.title: Transaction Completed
completed.description: The transaction has been successfully recorded.
